articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Australian cricket team to tour Pakistan for first time in 24 years in 2022
articles.description: Australia have not played in Pakistan since Mark Taylor hit an unbeaten 334 in Peshawar in 1998, with security concerns meaning all tours since have been played in the UAE.
articles.content:
Cricket Australia will push ahead with the first tour of Pakistan in 24 years, with chief executive Nick Hockley insistent he wants the trip in March to go ahead.

articles.author: Camron Slessor
articles.title: Indigenous culture to be celebrated as WBBL launches inaugural First Nations Round
articles.description: The WBBL will hold its first league-wide First Nations Round this season, celebrating the hundreds of traditional custodians of the land that cricket is played on.
articles.content:
Ella Hayward is one of just five Indigenous players currently playing in the Women's Big Bash League. Key points:
